response.summary:
Systems and Computing engineer with 6+ years of experience mainly in Android development. As a remarkable experience, I had the chance to work in apps development for Government National Security Entities, which were integrated with biometric hardware, thus, gaining experience handling confidential data. In addition, I took part of the first Colombian groceries e-commerce startup. Also, I worked on mobile products' purchasing apps for Latin American telecommunications companies. Besides this, I have been creating new features for a USA only mobile payments app. 

I’m skilled using clean architecture and SOLID principles, Android Architecture Components, MVP and MVVM architectures, unit testing, UI automation and agile methodologies for releasing reliable apps.
response.skills: Software Development, Android Development, Mobile Application Development, Scrum, Project Management, Java, Databases, C#, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Android, Team Leadership, German, English, Software Deployment, Biometrics, kotlin, java, Android Studio, Android Testing, android

profile_positions.description:
Contractor through Taller Technologies.

Implementation of new features for business profiles on money transfer and payments mobile app.

- Responsible for delivery of charity and tax verification android features.
- Android team leader and point of contact for the product team.
- Product and technical discussions to get best solution approaches.
- Development of new functionality according to defined requirements.
- UI Automation for main business flows.
- Unit testing for business logic layer.
- Pair programming, code review and PR approvals.
- Bug fixes, code refactoring and improvements.

Technologies: Android, Kotlin, Java, MVP, Koin, Clean Architecture, RxJava, BrowserStack, Retrofit, Mockito, JUnit5, GitHub Actions, Firebase, ConstraintLayouts, AppCenter, Coroutines, Crashlytics, Espresso, Jira, Confluence.
profile_positions.title: Senior Android Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Implementation and maintenance of new payment options on mobile products' purchasing apps for telecommunications companies (Claro Brazil and Tigo Latam).

- Provide users with new payment options to get mobile products (data, SMS, minutes).
- Product and technical discussions to define best solutions.
- Responsible for releasing and ramping up new app versions.
- Decreasing of compile time by creating modules along with android team.
- Development of new features according to clients requirements.
- Unit testing for business logic layer.
- Code migration from Java to Kotlin.

Technologies: Kotlin, Android, Java, MVVM, Room, JUnit4, ViewModel, LiveData, Clean Architecture, RxJava, Jira, Retrofit, Mockito, TeamCity CI, Confluence, ConstraintLayouts, Firebase, Google Play Console.
profile_positions.title: Senior Android Mobile Developer

profile_positions.description:
Implementation of new app capabilities in post checkout module to allow users managing their orders.

- Product team support to define new changes for checkout flow.
- Rest APIs consumption.
- Creation of reusable view components.
- Code review and PR approvals.
- Development of defined changes and unit tests for most common cases.
- Events tracking and remote configurations using Firebase.

Technologies: Android, Kotlin, Java, MVVM, Clean Architecture, Jira, ConstraintLayouts, JUnit4, Dagger, LiveData, ViewModel, RxJava, Retrofit, Firebase, Confluence, Crashlitics.
profile_positions.title: Android Developer

profile_positions.description:
Creation and development of identity verification app for Colombia National Police. It collects fingerprint data and sends it to API in order to match it with national identity databases, thus validate identity information about people.

- Technical leader in approval certification process against National Identity Entity.
- Integration between biometric captor and software to obtain and manipulate fingerprints data.
- Creation of reusable module to interact with the biometric captor.
- Migration from legacy views to ConstraintLayouts.
- Development of main app screens according to client requirements.
- Testing in production environment along with client. 
- Reported bugs resolution.

Technologies: Android, Kotlin, NDK, Java, C++, MVP, Dagger, ConstraintLayouts, RxJava, Retrofit, Morpho Fingerprint captor, Jira, Confluence.
profile_positions.title: Android Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Exploration of Jenkins as CI engine and Docker as container platform. Creation of PoCs simulating an entire development cycle, from pushing code to repo, through deploying code to server and tests execution to notify pipeline results, using required technologies.

- Explore and integrate involved technologies into Jenkins pipelines.
- Manual workflow testing.
- Step by step documentation, knowledge sharing and results to coworkers.

Technologies: Docker, Jenkins, Oracle Service Bus, GitHub, Groovy.
profile_positions.title: IT Architecture intern

education.degree_name: Summer School Scholarship - Robotics for Future Industrial Applications

company.name: Venmo
company.description: At Venmo, we’re working to build a payment experience that's simple, delightful and connected. Since our founding in 2009, we’ve quickly grown from an idea hatched by two college roommates who wanted a better way to pay each other back to the go-to digital wallet that’s known and loved by millions. What started off as a simple SMS platform to send and receive money has evolved into a social payments app allowing people to pay, split and share their experiences.
